item.title: I Built This Website Using Hugo
item.description: TL;DR This short article explains why I chose Hugo as the framework to build my personal website, what Hugo is, who Hugo is for, and the details of my website. Why I Chose Hugo There are mainly four reasons why I used Hugo to build my personal website. Open-source: Hugo is an open-source technology that allows anyone to create a static website. Therefore, the code is maintained by a community of developers and other contributors which consequently makes it performant and more secure.
